title: Welcome to my blog
text:
Seemingly everyone connected with fastai recommends starting a blog to track and share your progress. So here we go!
I will include posts on other topics too.

title: Is it a lizard?
text:
I don’t know what all the code means yet, but it turns out that it is surprisingly easy to train a deep learning model for a task like this.
I did learn the value of looking at the data at each step - when searching for “rock photos” I ended up with photos of Dwayne “the Rock” Johnson in my data :)

title: About
text:
I’m working through the fastai course, Practical Deep Learning for Coders 2022, and learning to build iOS apps.
I’m also working through a math textbook, Galois Theory by David Cox. In general, I’m always learning some math, riding bikes, lifting weights, and playing some flamenco or classical guitar music.
